tool_description:
Your personal document and media hub.
Simplify your file management. View, organize & share your files instantly in a single place.
name: doctape
title: doctape

api_list.name: Clone file
Retrieve HD video (mp4)
Retrieve poster (jpg)
Extract archive (zip)
Retrieve HD poster (jpg)
List files

required_parameters.name: include_meta
required_parameters.description: include meta data for each file

api_list.name: List tapes
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://doctape-doctape.p.rapidapi.com/tape"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "doctape-doctape.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
